adrFormatAddress: 4865 Broadway, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
My experienced with D' Vine Beauty Bar,  was amazing!!
I will be going back. I ended up going there 'cause the lady that I was going for pedicure was busy and couldn't see me. So i deceided to go to D'Vine Beauty Bar, I went for pepedicure & Manicure. This people were so nice, and attentive. They offered me complementary beverage. They asked me how I liked it done and did it just right.I was Not planning on doing my hair because i like the place i usually go but i said to myself why not im already here so let's do it. Perla the stylist  did my hair really nice. They were all profesional, the prices are reasonable. You'll be happy if you'll give it a try!!!

originalText.text: I am not one to give bad reviews but I don't want anyone to go through what I went through. At first we Always take pictures. The hair stylist had a concern look on his face. (This was after my hair was done) . I didn't ththing of it at first,until I got home. My hair felt weak and brittle.  My hair was falling out. My hair  was overprocessed. I spoke to the hair stylist, he tried to blame me for it. I spent over $200 on olaplex products to help with the damage. Then I had to go to another salon to treat the damage,to save my hair.then they told me that my hair was indeed overprocessed. The other salon said that I shouldn't wet my hair and to not add heat to my hair. I have to keep going to the other salon for deep conditioning treatments. They said that in 6 months I'll see improvements. This mess up is costing me more money than I needed to spend if they were to have done it right in the first place. Now I have to go to this other salon every 3 weeks to deep condition my hair cut of this place. I also had my nails done my them. My nails got infected after using them.my nails are weak.i bought vitamins for my uair and nails. DO NOT GO TO THEM. You'll save your time and money.

originalText.text: I love the nail bar the ladies are very nice. My nail tech lucy is the best she always hooks my nails n feet. The serivces is great my claim places to just relax.

originalText.text: I use to come to this location with the old management when it first opened and it was called posh, and I will continue to tag them and talk badly about their company and service because regardless of management their employees are the biggest gossipers known to man kind! They talk so much Sh*%!!! Never would I ever continue to go to this salon they've lost my family and I as loyal clients just because of their employees with their attitudes and disrespect. They need to learn some manners! Before I go out there and show em

originalText.text: Marty was amazing. The service is excellent and my hair color and style was beyond what I expected. Definitely my new Hairstlist.

text.text: Marty was amazing. The service is excellent and my hair color and style was beyond what I expected. Definitely my new Hairstlist.
